name: Oven Baked Taquitos Recipe
description: Oven Baked Taquitos Recipe made with a creamy black bean filling, filled with flavor and baked in the oven until golden and crispy. Only 30 minutes from start to finish, these are the perfect weeknight meal!
recipeIngredient: (2) 15-oz canned black beans, drained and rinsed
1 recipe Cashew Sour Cream (*may use store-bought non-dairy sour cream if desired)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F and line a baking pan with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F and line a baking pan with parchment paper.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the filling: In a large bowl, add drained black beans, drained green chiles, green onions, the spices, salt, Sriracha and 1/2 cup Cashew Sour Cream. Stir until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the filling: In a large bowl, add drained black beans, drained green chiles, green onions, the spices, salt, Sriracha and 1/2 cup Cashew Sour Cream. Stir until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Soften the tortillas: Wrap 5 corn tortillas at a time in a damp paper towel and microwave for about 30 seconds to soften. Don't skip this part because they will be near impossible to roll them up if you do!
recipeInstructions.name: Soften the tortillas: Wrap 5 corn tortillas at a time in a damp paper towel and microwave for about 30 seconds to soften. Don't skip this part because they will be near impossible to roll them up if you do!

recipeInstructions.text: Place about 2 tablespoons of the filling in each tortilla and wrap up tightly. Place seam side down on prepared baking pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Place about 2 tablespoons of the filling in each tortilla and wrap up tightly. Place seam side down on prepared baking pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy. Remove from oven and serve with additional Cashew Sour Cream and/or salsa for dipping.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy. Remove from oven and serve with additional Cashew Sour Cream and/or salsa for dipping.
